body.p: Follow these steps to import an existing configuration file into the Cloud Profile Manager:

li.p: Ensure that a config file is present in your configuration directory. For example, this is $HOME/.oci/config on a Linux host.
Click the Import icon to open a dialog that prompts you to import cloud profiles from external files.

note.p: This action overwrites any cloud profiles that are in your global settings directory.

li.p: Your cloud profile settings are saved to the oci_config file in your global settings directory.
Click Properties to show the cloud profile settings.
Double-click the appropriate field to change the value.
Click Apply to save your changes.
